alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Hancock; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:49AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN MADISON...NORTHWESTERN HANCOCK...MARION AND SOUTHERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 1047 AM EST, a heavy snow shower was located along a line extending from near Noblesville to near Brownsburg. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this squall. Quick reductions in visibility, down to 0.5 miles Locations impacted include... Indianapolis, Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Lawrence, Beech Grove, Speedway, Westfield, Cumberland, McCordsville, Pendleton, Fortville, Ingalls, Lapel, Meridian Hills, Warren Park, Clermont, Rocky Ripple, Williams Creek, and Wynnedale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 106 and 124. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 221. Interstate 70 between mile markers 77 and 98. Interstate 74 between mile markers 70 and 96. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for quick reductions in visibility and snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
